secondaryText.line2: We never use no-code tools or templates.
secondaryText.line3: So you get a website that's truly yours ❤️

Cards.title: Packages
Cards.description: Easy, set prices for a simple SaaS, landing page or website.

Cards.title: Software Development
Cards.description: Custom software solution. We call to talk through your ideas to find a suitable scope.

Cards.title: Consulting
Cards.description: Help you with your project or advice to get you started.

ProcessFlowCards.title: Introductory Call
ProcessFlowCards.description: In a 30 min call, we will discuss how can we provide value to you and your business.

ProcessFlowCards.title: Requirement & Scope
ProcessFlowCards.description: Our team will gather all the information needed to start the project and provide you with a proposal Once you accept the proposal, we will start working on the project.

ProcessFlowCards.title: Development
ProcessFlowCards.description: The team work in iterations with frequent communication with you in order to deliver the best possible result.

ProcessFlowCards.title: Handover & Support
ProcessFlowCards.description: After you get the result, you have the option of ongoing maintenance and development of new features.

ServiceCard.title: Landing Page
ServiceCard.description: We create a fully fledged landing page that converts visitors into customers. Custom design, copywriting, and development - we don't use templates here.

ServiceCard.title: Software Development
ServiceCard.description: We will work closely to understand your goals and create an MVP for your next big SaaS.You also have the option for ongoing support & development to scale even further!

ServiceCard.title: Consulting / Mentoring
ServiceCard.description: Need help with your career path or startup? Let's talk about your goals and how we can help you achieve them.

Question.heading: Still wondering if we're right for you?

faqs.question: What is the typical process like?
faqs.answer: Our process involves understanding your requirements, designing, developing, testing, and deploying your website.

faqs.question: How much will my website cost?
faqs.answer: The cost of a website depends on its complexity, features, and design requirements. Contact us for a personalized quote.

faqs.question: How long does a website take to build?
faqs.answer: The duration depends on the scope and complexity of the project. On average, it takes 4-6 weeks.

faqs.question: I already have the designs, can you develop them?
faqs.answer: Yes, we can work with your designs and develop a fully functional website based on them.
